subject: FW: Online Deposit email receive showing Gift card validation information?

full_threads.body: @heath just gonna close this one.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@joel

Can you please have a look on the below. Cheers

Hi Heath

See email trail below, can you remove the gift card T&C and change it to the below on the online deposit receipts?

Nick’s Restaurant & Bar Group
ABN: 87 080 232 686 <tel:87%20080%20232%20686>
Nick’s Seafood Restaurant | Adria Bar Restaurant | I’m Angus Steakhouse | Cyren Bar Grill Seafood | Nick’s Bar & Grill | Stacks Bar Restaurant
COCKLE BAY WHARF | KING STREET WHARF | HARBOURSIDE | DARLING QUARTER
1300 989 989 <tel:1300%20989%20989> www.nicksgroup.com.au <http://www.nicksgroup.com.au/>

Deposits: Your deposit amount will be deducted from your final bill on the day. Please be aware we do not split bills. Deposit will not be refunded if the restaurant receives less than 7 days notice of cancellation. Outstanding Amounts: Any outstanding amounts that have not been settled & paid at the completion of your booking will be charged by us to the credit card provided by you and held on file. Final Numbers: Your final numbers are required 72hrs in advance; if we are notified of a decrease in numbers up until 24hrs prior to your scheduled arrival time a $25 per head charge to the variance in numbers will apply (this excludes special event days where full charges will still apply). If notification has not been received of any changes to your confirmed guest numbers prior to your scheduled arrival time then full payment will be required for any missing guests. Cancellation: Should the restaurant receive cancellation of the groups booking less then 24 hours notice of arrival full cancellation of the package price by the amount of guests confirmed will apply and will be charged to the credit card on file. All reservations with 40 or more guests will require full food payment along with your final guest numbers 72 hours in advance unless otherwise arranged with your events coordinator.


Natasha Dauner | Marketing & Graphic Design Manager
NICK'S RESTAURANT & BAR GROUP
D (02) 8281 1169 <tel:(02)%208281%201169> | M 0424 100 250 <tel:0424%20100%20250> | T 1300 989 989 <tel:1300%20989%20989>

<https://www.nicksgroup.com.au/>

Date: Friday, 12 July 2019 at 11:46 am
To: Natasha Dauner <natasha@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:natasha@nicksgroup.com.au>>, Amanda Mercadal <Amanda@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:Amanda@nicksgroup.com.au>>

Subject: Online Deposit email receive showing Gift card validation information?

Hi Tash / Amanda,

I just happened to see the Online Deposit email received by marketing and each venue’s function coordinators bottom part information which is showing “gift card validation information Gift Cards may be redeemed at any of the restaurants listed above. Gift Cards are not redeemable for cash. The original Gift Card must be presented at the time of redemption. Copies or expired Gift Cards will not be accepted. Please treat your valid Gift Card like cash. Lost or stolen Gift Cards will not be replaced or refunded. Gift Cards are valid 3 years from date of purchase. For full Terms & Conditions visitwww.nicksgroup.com.au <http://www.nicksgroup.com.au/> Please note: If you have purchased our Gift Card from the 31st of March 2018, your gift card has a validity of 3 years (not 12 months). Please disregard any reference to a 12 month validity on the cards, we are in the process of reprinting new gift cards with the correct validity term. Any questions on this, please contact us on 02 8281 1169 <tel:02%208281%201169>”.

Is this the setup meant to be? Online deposit payment has nothing to do with Online gift card purchase.

Best regards,

Shirley

Sent: Friday, 12 July 2019 9:57 AM
